statements: DELETE FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE billing_code = 200 AND insurance_provider = 'XYZ Insurance';
DELETE FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE patient_id = 100 AND insurance_provider = 'Blue Cross';
DELETE FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE billing_code = 500 OR claim_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM telecardiology_services WHERE doctor_id = 101 AND service_type = 'Cardiac Checkup';
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 500 AND claim_amount = 2000.50;
DELETE FROM TelecardiologyBilling WHERE patient_id = 201 AND bill_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM insurance WHERE patient_id = 2003 AND policy_number = 'ABC123';
